title: Great ditrigonal dodecicosidodecahedron
summary: In geometry, the great ditrigonal dodecicosidodecahedron (or great dodekified icosidodecahedron) is a nonconvex uniform polyhedron, indexed as U42. It has 44 faces (20 triangles, 12 pentagons, and 12 decagrams), 120 edges, and 60 vertices.[1] Its vertex figure is an isosceles trapezoid.
